title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. V, subch. C, pt. 328 - Arbitration Of Medical Bills
content:

§ 328.1 - Definitions
§ 328.2 - Notice of objection to bill
§ 328.3 - Physician's decision regarding arbitration

§ 328.6 - Notices of arbitrators and hearing
§ 328.7 - Withdrawal of objection; settlement

§ 328.10 - Decision

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. V, subch. C, pt. 328

Statutory authority: Workers' Compensation Law, §§ 13-a[3], 13-g, 13-k, 117, 141

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
